name: profile-al-development
description: Full-lifecycle AL development for Business Central with Test-Driven Development (TDD) workflow. Testable architecture from day 1 with dependency injection and interfaces. Document-driven workflow with 12 specialized agents, test specifications before code, RED-GREEN-REFACTOR cycles, iterative quality loops, approval gates, MCP integration (BC Intelligence, MS Docs, AL Dependency). Supports TDD, estimation, planning, development, testing, and expert consultation.
